archimate:ApplicationService.name: [US] Foreground Object Query Service (Application Service)
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation:
Provide an open and freely available data service quesrying CMB-S4 transient detections in a manner consistent with the mechanisms expected by the community:
* Support queries by interactive and programatic means. * In 2020, we would have a base of expectations which is TBD and we need an active opinion on VAO queries suitable for tap * Additional data products include cutouts
